gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: SMART-R Radar Rain Type Data: DYNAMO Legacy Collection
SMART-R Radar Rain Type Data: DYNAMO Legacy Collection

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Department of Atmospheric Science, 1371 Campus Delivery
Department of Atmospheric Science, 1371 Campus Delivery

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set contains the 10 minute resolution gridded rain type (convective and stratiform) data from the SMART-R1 Doppler radar that was located on Addu Atoll of the Maldive Islands during DYNAMO. The data are in NetCDF format.

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: EARTH SCIENCE > SPECTRAL/ENGINEERING > RADAR > RADAR REFLECTIVITY
EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSPHERE > CLOUDS > CONVECTIVE CLOUDS/SYSTEMS (OBSERVED/ANALYZED) > PRECIPITATING CONVECTIVE CLOUD SYSTEMS
